ab-so-lute-ly,"},{"lineNumber":236145,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃しません……」","translatedEnglishLine":" will not let them escape...\""},{"lineNumber":236146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と、言いたいのですが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Or so I’d like to say...\""},{"lineNumber":236147,"originalJapaneseLine":"「必死で捜しとんのに見つからんそうやね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They say they’re searching desperately but can’t find him.\""},{"lineNumber":236148,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大会参加選手には手に不可視の紋章入れられて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Participants have an invisible mark put on their say.\""},{"lineNumber":236153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それこそ異世界にでも逃げない限り、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unless he escaped to another world or half.\""},{"lineNumber":236162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「徐々に徐々に決勝まで近づいとるこの感じ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This feeling of gradually getting closer to the final,"},{"lineNumber":236163,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中々ワクワクするやないの」","translatedEnglishLine":" is quite exciting, isn’t it.\""},{"lineNumber":236164,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それでは明日もまたこの時間に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, let’s meet again at this time tomorrow,"},{"lineNumber":236165,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お会いしましょーう」","translatedEnglishLine":" shall we?\""},{"lineNumber":236166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「歯ぁ磨いてから寝るんやでー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Make sure to brush your teeth before going to bed!\""},{"lineNumber":236167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この番組は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This program is brought to you by,"},{"lineNumber":236168,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆で称えよう偉大な陶器のハニワ教、","translatedEnglishLine":" The Great Ceramic Haniwa Cult, let us all praise,"},{"lineNumber":236169,"originalJapaneseLine":"　の提供でお送りました」","translatedEnglishLine":" the sponsor.\""},{"lineNumber":236170,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":236171,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":236172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":236173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「乱義ーーーーーッ！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rangiーーー!!\""},{"lineNumber":236174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待ってくれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wait, please,"},{"lineNumber":236175,"originalJapaneseLine":"　僕は怒られるようなことはしていない」","translatedEnglishLine":" I haven’t done anything that deserves anger.\""},{"lineNumber":236176,"originalJapaneseLine":"「フェミニストっぽい顔して、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have a feminist-looking face,"},{"lineNumber":236177,"originalJapaneseLine":"　試合相手の女の子を落としくさったのか！","translatedEnglishLine":" yet you tricked the girl who was your match!"},{"lineNumber":236178,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くきーー！　えっちー！」","translatedEnglishLine":" Grrr—! You perv!\""},{"lineNumber":236179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すけっちー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sketchy!\""},{"lineNumber":236180,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わんたっちー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"One-touch!\""},{"lineNumber":236181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうそう、コイツはこーゆー奴なんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah, this guy is exactly that kind of person.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後、反撃に転じたアレキサンダー選手の攻撃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, Alexander’s counterattack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これに為す術なく受け続けたヒーロー選手が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero kept receiving it helplessly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次第に立っていることが出来ず決着となりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gradually could no longer stand, which decided the match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごく単純な力比べやったらヒーローも負けへん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it was just a simple contest of strength, Hero wouldn’t lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 経験と実力の差がそのまま出た試合、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The match showed the difference in experience and skill,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなところやろうな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that must be it, I guess~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合後、二人はいくつか会話を交わすと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After the match, the two exchanged a few words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がっちりと力強く握手を交わします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then exchanged a firm and strong handshake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「熱い戦いに、会場からは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For the passionate fight, from the audience,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選手二人に惜しみない拍手が送られました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two players received unreserved applause."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｄブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First match of Block D,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲ＶＳアスタリスク」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hojo Soun vs Asterisk."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとびっくり、試合会場に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Surprisingly, at the match venue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスタ選手が現れませんでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Asta did not appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今大会初の逃亡者です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the first runaway in this tournament."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「控え室には、用事が出来たので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the waiting room, only a note saying that he had something come up

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰りますの書き置きだけが残され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that he would be leaving was left behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより早雲選手の不戦勝が決定」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: resulting in Soun’s default victory being decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神都市はこの手の逃亡を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fighting God City absolutely does not tolerate this kind of fleeing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に許しません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it absolutely will not forgive it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特殊な魔法を使って逃しません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and uses special magic to prevent escape."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜーーったい、ぜーーったい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Defi-ni-tely, defi-ni-tely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜーーーーーーーーーったい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ab-so-lute-ly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃しません……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will not let them escape..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、言いたいのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or so I’d like to say..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「必死で捜しとんのに見つからんそうやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They say they’re searching desperately but can’t find him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大会参加選手には手に不可視の紋章入れられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Participants have an invisible mark put on their hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大会後に解除されるまで消えへん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which doesn’t disappear until after the tournament ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その紋章の力で位置特定すんねやけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They use the power of that mark to locate them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、アスタさんの反応が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, but there is no response from Asta anywhere in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界のどこにもないんだそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or so they say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それこそ異世界にでも逃げない限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unless he escaped to another world or something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなことは不可能なんですけどねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that would be impossible though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、何はともかく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, whatever the case,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして早雲選手の二回戦突破が決定しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soun’s passage to the second round has been decided like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真っ当に強いお人やからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He’s a genuinely strong person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三回戦での戦いに期待しとこか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s look forward to his fight in the third round."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、今日の試合はこんなところですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s about it for today’s matches."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで二回戦の半分は終わりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Half of the second round is now over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日はもう半分をお届けします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow we will deliver the remaining half."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「徐々に徐々に決勝まで近づいとるこの感じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This feeling of gradually getting closer to the final,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々ワクワクするやないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is quite exciting, isn’t it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは明日もまたこの時間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let’s meet again at this time tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お会いしましょーう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shall we?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歯ぁ磨いてから寝るんやでー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure to brush your teeth before going to bed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This program is brought to you by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆で称えよう偉大な陶器のハニワ教、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Great Ceramic Haniwa Cult, let us all praise,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の提供でお送りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sponsor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義ーーーーーッ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rangiーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待ってくれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, please,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕は怒られるようなことはしていない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven’t done anything that deserves anger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「フェミニストっぽい顔して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have a feminist-looking face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試合相手の女の子を落としくさったのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: yet you tricked the girl who was your match!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くきーー！　えっちー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grrr—! You perv!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すけっちー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sketchy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わんたっちー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One-touch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、コイツはこーゆー奴なんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, this guy is exactly that kind of person."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その後、反撃に転じたアレキサンダー選手の攻撃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After that, Alexander’s counterattack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これに為す術なく受け続けたヒーロー選手が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hero kept receiving it helplessly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次第に立っていることが出来ず決着となりました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and gradually could no longer stand, which decided the match."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごく単純な力比べやったらヒーローも負けへん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it was just a simple contest of strength, Hero wouldn’t lose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 経験と実力の差がそのまま出た試合、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The match showed the difference in experience and skill,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなところやろうな〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that must be it, I guess~"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「試合後、二人はいくつか会話を交わすと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After the match, the two exchanged a few words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がっちりと力強く握手を交わします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then exchanged a firm and strong handshake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「熱い戦いに、会場からは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For the passionate fight, from the audience,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選手二人に惜しみない拍手が送られました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the two players received unreserved applause."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Ｄブロック一戦目、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "First match of Block D,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北条早雲ＶＳアスタリスク」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hojo Soun vs Asterisk."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんとびっくり、試合会場に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Surprisingly, at the match venue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アスタ選手が現れませんでした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: player Asta did not appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今大会初の逃亡者です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the first runaway in this tournament."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「控え室には、用事が出来たので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the waiting room, only a note saying that he had something come up

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰りますの書き置きだけが残され、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and that he would be leaving was left behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これにより早雲選手の不戦勝が決定」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: resulting in Soun’s default victory being decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神都市はこの手の逃亡を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fighting God City absolutely does not tolerate this kind of fleeing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶対に許しません、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it absolutely will not forgive it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特殊な魔法を使って逃しません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and uses special magic to prevent escape."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜーーったい、ぜーーったい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Defi-ni-tely, defi-ni-tely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜーーーーーーーーーったい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ab-so-lute-ly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃しません……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will not let them escape..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、言いたいのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or so I’d like to say..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「必死で捜しとんのに見つからんそうやね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They say they’re searching desperately but can’t find him."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大会参加選手には手に不可視の紋章入れられて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Participants have an invisible mark put on their hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大会後に解除されるまで消えへん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: which doesn’t disappear until after the tournament ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その紋章の力で位置特定すんねやけど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They use the power of that mark to locate them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、アスタさんの反応が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, but there is no response from Asta anywhere in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界のどこにもないんだそうです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or so they say."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それこそ異世界にでも逃げない限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unless he escaped to another world or something,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなことは不可能なんですけどねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that would be impossible though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、何はともかく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, whatever the case,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして早雲選手の二回戦突破が決定しました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soun’s passage to the second round has been decided like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「真っ当に強いお人やからね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He’s a genuinely strong person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 三回戦での戦いに期待しとこか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s look forward to his fight in the third round."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と、今日の試合はこんなところですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s about it for today’s matches."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これで二回戦の半分は終わりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Half of the second round is now over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日はもう半分をお届けします」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow we will deliver the remaining half."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「徐々に徐々に決勝まで近づいとるこの感じ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This feeling of gradually getting closer to the final,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々ワクワクするやないの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is quite exciting, isn’t it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでは明日もまたこの時間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, let’s meet again at this time tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お会いしましょーう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shall we?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「歯ぁ磨いてから寝るんやでー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Make sure to brush your teeth before going to bed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この番組は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This program is brought to you by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆で称えよう偉大な陶器のハニワ教、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Great Ceramic Haniwa Cult, let us all praise,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: の提供でお送りました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sponsor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「乱義ーーーーーッ！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rangiーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待ってくれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wait, please,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕は怒られるようなことはしていない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I haven’t done anything that deserves anger."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「フェミニストっぽい顔して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You have a feminist-looking face,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 試合相手の女の子を落としくさったのか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: yet you tricked the girl who was your match!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くきーー！　えっちー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grrr—! You perv!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「すけっちー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sketchy!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わんたっちー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One-touch!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうそう、コイツはこーゆー奴なんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, yeah, this guy is exactly that kind of person."
